debug_mode.title: Debug mode
debug_mode.description: Sending debug level information to log port

drop_columns.title: Columns to drop
drop_columns.description:
* *comma separated list of columns*: columns to drop
* *NOT: comma separated list of columns*: drop all columns except columns in the list
* *ALL* : drop all columns and reset index - same as *NOT*

rename_columns.title: Rename Columns
rename_columns.description:
*  *comma separated list of mappings*: columns to be
renamed, e.g. Col1:col_1, Col2:col_2
